Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="ShareEverything.SEManageData" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Wcf"/> <Attribute Name="Procedure" Type="System.String" Value="ShareEverything.SEManageData"/> <Attribute Name="CLIENT_ID" Type="System.String" Value="[SCP_MARKER]"/> <Attribute Name="REQUEST_ID" Type="System.String" Value="##uid##"/> <Attribute Name="CUG_ID" Type="System.String" Value="func_get_line_after_dot(##CUG_ID##)"/> <Attribute Name="ACTION" Type="System.Int32" Value="0"/> <Attribute Name="SERVICE_CODE" Type="System.String" Value=""/> <Attribute Name="TARGET_MSISDN" Type="System.String" Value="+##msisdn##"/> <Attribute Name="NEW_MSISDN" Type="System.String" Value=""/> <Attribute Name="FinPlatformVersion" Type="System.String" Value="[COUNTER_VER]"/> </Attributes> <DataTable Name="TpShareLimits"> <Columns> <Column Name="CounterCode" Type="System.String"/> <Column Name="Value" Type="System.String"/> </Columns> <Rows>##Limits##</Rows> </DataTable> </DataSet>
